__e: The thing is, Aaron's getting difficult about my trip.
You said there's nothing to worry about.
Aaron, it's very important to me.
Aaron won't let him go just like that. He hired him for a year. He will send for the sheriff.
Wouldn't it be better if we made this good with Aaron?
Aaron and I are going swimming.
Aaron, what about the other one?
You have to see Aaron and meet everybody.
